org.webcurator.core.check
Interface Checker

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractChecker, BandwidthChecker, DiskSpaceChecker, HarvestAgentMemoryChecker, MemoryChecker, ProcessorCheck
public interface Checker

The Checker interface specifies the methods that must be implemented by a system check process.

Author:
nwaight
